name: Pacman launcher
description:
>>UPDATED!<<

Did you know? at the previous updates of this game, I made the game to a single "exe" app, meaning it is only a single file game. So move it to your desktop folder!

I removed the browser/HTML version due to technical errors and causes the video and screenshots to not show. But you still can play it on your browser.  Visit it

If you want to play it on your browser, then follow this link. There is also a "add-on" version of this game, it has reached over 50K downloads! visit it

Play Pacman on Windows 7/8/10, and play it on Android and iOS are available for download too!

This is the classic, 8-bit, and with original sprites: Pacman Desktop, this app is completely free, you can pay it at your own price, or just download it for free

This game is still growing, so please share this to your friends, anyway you can. Soon, I will make a macOS app.

Notes for Pacman Mobile: Once you first open the app, you must have WIFI, then you can run the app without WIFI
